title: Mina Kimes talks Ben Simmons, the NFL and the guy with a really unfortunate name!
description:
Bomani Jones and Mina Kimes discuss Sixers F Ben Simmons getting suspending for acting up at practice, how the Nets are handling the Kyrie Irving saga and names that you can’t use anymore in light of Brooklyn’s David Duke Jr. (1:24). Plus, the two discuss where they got it wrong with evaluating Bills QB Josh Allen and Cardinals QB Kyler Murray (24:33).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
